src:
Vučić: Ispred RTS-a nije bilo više od 150 ljudi

05 Nov 2019, 20:45

Predsednik Srbije Aleksandar Vučić izjavio je da ispred RTS-a večeras nije bilo više od 150 ljudi i da mu je žao što je došlo oko 30 njegovih pristalica koji su sa predstavnicima Jedan od pet miliona ušli u nepotreban dijalog.Rekao je da je spreman da odgovori i na najprovokativnije pitanje, ali da nije način da nekoga sačekujete i sprečavate mu kretanje jer je to fašizam.Vučić je rekao da je skup ispred RTS-a protivzakonit i da se njime šalje loša poruka. "Moramo da reagujemo pažljivije i da ne nasedamo na provokacije", rekao je Vučić u Upitniku.On je rekao i da želi da ljudima ispred RTS-a pokaže da to nije budućnost Srbije i da hoće da se bori za normalnu zemlju.Vučić je dodao da nisu krivi ti ljudi već nekoliko onih koji ne znaju šta hoće sa sobom i misle da mogu da rade šta hoće, a nemaju podršku naroda."Oni meni ništa ne mogu. Mogu samo da me ubiju. Šta god su pokušavali da me spreče nisu uspeli", rekao je Vučić.
text:
Vucic: There were no more than 150 people in front of the RTS

05 Nov 2019, 19:45

Serbian President Aleksandar Vucic said that there were no more than 150 people in front of the RTS tonight, and that he was sorry that about 30 of his supporters had come in with unnecessary dialogue with representatives of One in Five Million. He said he was ready to respond and the most provocative question, but that it is not a way to wait for someone and prevent him from moving because it is fascism. Vucic said the rally in front of RTS is illegal and that it sends a bad message. "We need to react more carefully and not get caught up in provocations," Vucic said in a Questionnaire. He also said he wanted to show people in front of RTS that this was not the future of Serbia and that he wanted to fight for a normal country. Vucic added that these people are not to blame but a few who do not know what they want with them and think they can do what they want and do not have the support of the people. "They can't do anything to me. They can just kill me. Whatever they tried to stop me succeeded, "said Vucic.
